channel.title: Posts on ZCP
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on ZCP

item.title: Susan Mutami. Are her allegations founded?
CALL FOR SOLIDARITY
item.description: CALL FOR SOLIDARITY NATIONAL AND INTERNATIONAL 18th June 2022 in the case of Comrade Obert Masararure President of the Amalgamated Rural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe (ARTUZ), falsely arrested and accused of murder, as the teachers of Zimbabwe embark on job action due to salaries well below the Poverty Datum Line. Yesterday, 17th June 2022 Comrade Obert Masaraure, President of the Amalgamated Rural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe (ARTUZ) was refused bail at Harare Magistrate’s Court after being arrested for the murder of a friend.

item.title: Dr Joshua Nkomo - A victim of imperialist forces.
Helen Suzman Foundation challenge government in terminating the Zimbabwean Exemption Permits
The Sun Never Sets: Why Is AFRICOM Expanding in Zambia?
Vanguard Vol.2 Issue 1
item.description: Download pdf The Vanguard began as the newsletter of the Zimbabwe Communist Group and four issues were produced between January and April 2016. With the unification of the Zimbabwe Communist Group and the Zimbabwe Communist League on 1st May 2017, it was agreed that The Vanguard — now simply Vanguard — would now be the responsibility of ZimCom Publishers formerly a subsidiary of the Zimbabwe Communist League and now a subsidiary of the Zimbabwe Communist Party.
